## Project Details
- **Type:** Static Website (HTML/CSS/JS) – Hybridlogs Journals
- **Structure:** Multi-page website with product pages, blog, legal pages

## Pages
- `index.html` — Landing page (Hero, Bestseller, Features)
- `studienplaner.html` — Product page: Studienplaner
- `notizbuch.html` — Product page: Schul-Notizbuch
- `lernjournal.html` — Product page: Lernjournal
- `blog.html` — Blog overview
- `impressum.html` — Impressum (legal)
- `datenschutz.html` — Privacy policy
- `css/styles.css` — Dark theme with CSS custom properties
- `js/main.js` — Navigation, cookie banner, scroll animations
- `images/` — Product and blog images (placeholders to be added)

## Notes
- Dark, minimalist design matching Hybridlogs brand
- Colors and spacing configurable via CSS variables in `:root`
- Mobile navigation with hamburger menu and slide-in panel
- Cookie consent banner with localStorage persistence
- Amazon product links already integrated
- No build step needed — open HTML directly in browser
